thread.title: GOP lawmaker says he has unedited Planned Parenthood videos
thread.title_full: GOP lawmaker says he has unedited Planned Parenthood videos

author: ALAN FRAM
title: GOP lawmaker says he has unedited Planned Parenthood videos
text:
GOP lawmaker says his committee received abortion foes' unedited Planned Parenthood videos 
By ALAN FRAM Published: 10/14/15 2:25 pm EDT - Updated: 10/14/15 2:26 pm EDT 
WASHINGTON — House Republicans say anti-abortion activists have sent them unedited videos they recorded showing Planned Parenthood officials discussing their retrieval of fetal tissue. 
The chairman of the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee says Republicans and Democrats will be able to view the recordings. GOP Rep. Jason Chaffetz (CHAY'-fits) of Utah says the videos won't be publicly released now — "to ensure the safety and security of all individuals recorded." 
The committee subpoenaed the videos last month. It's one of several committees investigating whether Planned Parenthood has illegally sold fetal tissue for profit. 
Abortion foes say the organization did. 
Planned Parenthood says it's broken no laws and that videos previously released by the activists were deceptively edited. 
Planned Parenthood is warning that the videos given to Congress also may be altered.
